actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain machine tools for working wire of iron and steel.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to: (1) revise the article description of certain machine tools for working wire of iron or steel; and (2) extend the suspension of duty on such tools.

titles.title: A bill to extend and modify the temporary suspension of duty on certain machine tools for working wire of iron and steel.
